snippet.title: Vontaze Burfict, Cincinnati Bengals discussing new contract, according to report
snippet.description:

snippet.description:

snippet.title: NHL playoffs: Rob Scuderi weighing down Penguins' Stanley Cup hopes
snippet.description:

The Pittsburgh Penguins need to shake up their defense, and it should start with their big free agent signing that was supposed to solidify their blue line.

snippet.title: Reinvented Nets hope experience pays off in playoffs
snippet.description:

The Nets survived a slow start and a season-ending injury to Brook Lopez to reach the playoffs. Will a veteran lineup be able to find success now that they're here?

snippet.description:
